attributes.action: Review the child benefits for the second child in a family
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As an expecting mum of twins I realise that the first child born will receive child benefit of £17 a week and the second child receives £10 a week, I am a working mum as a family we will finacially struggle to raise two children. This needs reviewing children cost the same regardless of how many you have, give us working families something back please!! Help us by signing this petition if you agree with this outrage!!
